message:
A Republican congressman with Tea Party ties declined to fire back at a town hall audience member this week who asked him when someone was going to shoot President Obama.

FALSE FLAG ALERT: "A town hall audience member in Georgia asked a congressman when someone will shoot President Obama."

http://www.nydailynews.com/news/politics/2011/02/25/2011-02-25_rep_paul_broun_asked_by_constituent_when_will_someone_shoot_president_obama.html
